website_summaries.verdict: A hassle-free, sometimes quiet and lightweight fridge that keeps things consistently chilled.
pros: Draws little electricity, great size for sodas, waters, a couple of day’s lunches
The freezer is tiny but maintains a frozen item for a short time
Adjustable legs, stainless steel door, and a perfect size to fit in dorms, underneath desks at work, and in recreation rooms
cons: Freezer is more of a separate chiller section, but not for making ice cubes

customer_reviews.title: Been using for 1 year...
customer_reviews.text: I love this... Quiet and COLD.. actually... First time using... Getting used to it, its for drinks upstairs... Well.. I'm lazy.. So i turned the temperature setting all the way up.... And everything in my fridge froze solid... In about 5 hours... So yea... Don't do that... Unless you want a freezer! Its keeping my water and wine so very cold... At the *4* temp setting... Brrrr cold drinks... What could be better!! Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Doyle MD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mini fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! My office is pretty small (maybe 8x8) so it sits a foot from me - under my desk. Noise was really a concern for me so I was happy to see it's REALLY quiet and keeps my food perfectly chilled. Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: KimTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I saw a lot of questions as to how much ...
customer_reviews.text: I saw a lot of questions as to how much the fridge can hold, which was my concern as well. It can hold a 24 pack of water. It also isn't very loud.
customer_reviews.author: Lights

customer_reviews.title: Chills as expected
customer_reviews.text: I had to turn it up to 6 (default was 5) to make it feel cold enough to touch. It will make ice though, just know that the refrigerator did not include an ice cube tray. I found one at a second hand store. The freezer dimension is about 7'W x 3"H x 9"D. It's a little noisy when the compressor turns on and off. I have it in an Airbnb room and slept in the room to test out the noise level. I was still able to sleep OK with it's noise level.
customer_reviews.author: concreteblonde57

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly in my office. Barely makes any noise. Fits all my pump parts, pumped milk, some waters and soda and snacks, and the "chiller" section keeps my freezer packs frozen all day until I need them for the drive home. The door is reversible - but it's a bit of a pain. I had to bring a tool set from home to do it. Almost wish I'd bought it long ago!
customer_reviews.author: Minh N

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love this frig! We needed one for the bedroom due to a relative moving into the house (long story 😕). We choose this one because of its size and price. The size is great. Didn't want a dorm sized frig and this provides lots more space for soda, etc. The price was great because we grabbed one of the Amazon Warehouse ones and saved. There was only a slight scratches on the film that covers the appliance. Removed the film and scratches were gone. Works like a charm but does have a clicking sound once in awhile I'm assuming when the compressor kicks in. Overall it's a great buy, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: jansvendsen60

customer_reviews.title: great minifridge
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned about ordering this fridge after a number of reviews noted damage during shipping. It seems like maybe the vendor took this feedback into account, because my fridge was very well packed in multiple layers of cardboard, as well as some Styrofoam. Definitely no damage. It's a great size, whisper quiet (I keep thinking that it is not on and checking it :-)). There is no real freezer, but the "chiller" compartment is cold enough to make ice cubes.
customer_reviews.author: WhenInRome

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for Mom!
customer_reviews.text: Use for Mom at nursing faciltiy when kitchen is closed .I can keep special foods ,I can buy or small dishes to eat if she slept through dinner. Or special types of puddings or drinks the facility may not have; Mom gets tired of same strawberry yogurt. Now I can buy her peach . If I make banana pudding ,I can take a sm. dish for her to share! Great for upstairs also or dorm room! Easy to keep clean . Need to buy inside thermostat for it to monitor tempurature tho" ! But love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: b. barns

customer_reviews.title: I works and I was able to change the direction the door opened fairly easily.
customer_reviews.text: This may be a refurbished fridge. When I took off the cardboard and styrofoam, I found the top was already scratched and dented and there were a bunch of dead gnats inside. The pegs that cover the screws are so flimsy that two out of three of them snapped rather than pulling up and out. Other than that, it's a fridge. I works and I was able to change the direction the door opened fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Anony Mouse

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have never had any issues when buying off of amazon so I was excited when I purchased this l, I barely received it yesterday and it has dents and cracks on the bottom of the fridge it also isn’t balance because one side has a screw and the other has a random knob to stand on. This thing is super wobbly I am scared to even plug it in. I immediately asked for a return label and I am returning it today. I would like a replacement but I’m scared the same thing is going to happen again. I will be sure to upload pics in a little while.
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE - DIED AFTER ONLY A MONTH OF USE
customer_reviews.text: With COVID, my employer has scaled back the staff lunch room, so I decided to just put my own mini fridge in my office to avoid the common space altogether. Ordered in July, got it quickly. School started end of August, so that's when I actually opened it up and started using it. I have had it in my office for one month - it died. There no longer seems to be an option for return. Paid $100 to use a fridge for one month. Not to mention the food I had to throw away. Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Sarbear

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Drinks Very Cold!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these compact refrigerators to go next to the two desks in my game room. They fit perfectly and keep things very cold! Almost too cold! I have to turn the dial down a notch to keep my Dr Peppers from freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron H.

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job still after 4 years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 4 years ago and still works. It is taller than I expected. The first thing to break tho was the freezer door. The freezer sometimes create a frozen block so you have to defrost it. The picture shows the top having soda cans but mine can't fit soda cans, it's too small. Stuff slips out from the shelves also and the bottom compartment is small also. It's completely silent which is great bc I keep it in my room. Overall I like it but I'm going to upgrade to the taller one soon. Btw I bought this for $65 and now it's over $100 so I feel like I got a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: lena

customer_reviews.title: My New Beauty Fridge !!
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new energy saving (earth friendly) fridge to put my face masks and homemade hair conditioners and sea salt scrubs in. Although you can store any items in here! It’s convenient because I can put bottled water to drink at night in the fridge without going all the way downstairs. Super spacious!! I plugged it in and within 2 minutes the entire fridge was COLD! Product shipped right away with no dents or blemishes! Seller kept in contact the whole time and was courteous and friendly. I would definitely purchase from this seller again!
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: The good part about this fridge is it's small. Unfortunately, I had my staff take it out of the box while I was out of the office. When I got to my office, I realized the door hits something inside which makes it difficult to close the door without kind of slamming it to make certain it's closed. What stinks is my office cleaning crew had already taken our the box, so I would have to buy another box (sturdy) to return the fridge. Another thing I didn't like was it looks like it was already used by someone else. If I had the box I would probably have returned. Wouldn't by again.
customer_reviews.author: NYRICAN

customer_reviews.title: Nice little fridge for the office
customer_reviews.text: I got this fridge as a present from my wife. It fits nicely under my desk in my office, and saves me money by allowing me to skip the daily trip to the soda vending machine. The fridge is big enough to hold quite a few sodas, which is what I wanted. It's relatively small, so if you are looking to hold a lot more than sodas, you might want to step to the next size. The fridge has a nice black finish, is quiet and cools very well. So far I'm pretty happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: Loud.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what to think yet. When it's running it sounds like a kid blowing bubbles in his soda with a straw. Hope that is not the death rattle. Have had it plugged in for little over an hour. It is cooling off nicely tho.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn  Fox

customer_reviews.title: Some problems
customer_reviews.text: It is 1/2" larger then the dimensions listed on each side if your trying to fit it into a space I would add an inch. Also, this product went into my cart $20+ more then when I selected it. After a few attempts Amazon finally credited me for the difference. While I spent more time trying to get that fixed then I would have liked, emails, chat, phone call, etc. the good part was when I finally got a phone number for customer service direct at Amazon and the rep, Heather, was just great and got everything fixed and was so nice. Amazon, great job finding her!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So light but works great n so quite!
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo quite I can’t believe it. The first night I had to get up n make sure it was running. And it made ice. I have it set on 5 n everything is perfectly cold. And it arrived with no dents. I have no complaints. I am 71 yrs young n I was able to pick it up n put on my dresser with no problem. I live with my daughter n granddaughter n this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: AJMPHX

customer_reviews.title: Freezer works well but the noise is a little big
customer_reviews.text: I'm a sucker of ice so the freezer is most important to me. It works! And super cold! Even the blueberries and water bottle near the freezer got frozen, too! And that's fine by me coz frozen blueberries are yummy. The only problem is the noise, it tolerable during the day but at night the noise just pops when everything quiets down. I hope it doesn't get noisier over time
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Keep cold beer nearby
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one of these I have had in the past 16 years. So, they have a useful life of 8 years outdoors but not in the elements. It sits under my Tiki Bar on my dock. It is covered by the Tiki Bar but still gets some weather but I take it in in the winter. The previous ones got tossed as the fridges lost their seal. It does a great job of keeping beer and soft drinks cold so I don't have to go back to the house for refreshment.
customer_reviews.author: F. L. Maybaum

customer_reviews.title: Great for drinks
customer_reviews.text: Super useful, there is nothing you need to do other than remove packing and plugin to outlet, and set a temperture. Its a plug and play, and all the different storage conpartment are great because it maximize the space you can use.
customer_reviews.author: ken james

customer_reviews.title: it takes a full day to fully cool down, and during that time it makes a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep food/drinks at my desk at work. When you first plug it in, it takes a full day to fully cool down, and during that time it makes a very annoying sound. I was nervous that it would always make that sound, but once it is cold, it stays silent (Thank God!). There's even a freezer compartment so I can store a small ice tray (just kidding, it stores mini liquor bottles).
customer_reviews.author: antisocial.ite

customer_reviews.title: Makes funny and distracting noises
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my cubicle at my office. And was surprised at how loud it was. It makes a weird gurgling as it cools, which happens often. I had other workers talking to me about it. After a couple days I just sent it back. If you need this in a quiet environment (office, dorm room, etc.) you are not going to be happy with this. One of the other workers has a Haier of the same size, and it runs silently. I am planning to buy one of those instead.
customer_reviews.author: theinternetguru

customer_reviews.title: MAKES NOISE - KEEPS ME AWAKE
customer_reviews.text: It is small and cheap... I wanted it in my bedroom to keep my medicines in. IT MAKES NOISE... Kind of like a popping sound every 5-7 minutes. Can't sleep. I guess you pay for what you get. Probably sold by somebody that got a good deal on defective refrigerators. Don't put it in your bedroom as you get no sleep. It is okay if your deaf or you move it away from where you sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Fittery

customer_reviews.title: Very loud and does not make ice!
customer_reviews.text: Very loud when cooling! Sounds like a hungry bear growling constantly from the corner of the room. When set to freeze, it doesn't actually get cold enough to make ice. I find my ice trays not freezing after 24 hours and sometimes with a layer of water still at the bottom. It's also exceptionally small on the inside because 1/8 of the space is taken up by the cooling tower/vent.
customer_reviews.author: HunDo

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great small fridge! It actually fits more then I thought it would. It is a perfect size to have in an office at work. Also good size for college students who will have minimal food due to having a dinning package and want to keep drinks and small snacks in there. Fridge is not too noisy and the temperature settings are good.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie llerenas

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office! But the frozen compartment isn't cold enough!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fridge so I had a place to store my lunch at work - since I didn't want to use the shared fridge in the kitchen, and this fridge worked great! Only gripe I had is that my freezing compartment isn't nearly as cold as I expected, In fact, I turned it to the coldest setting once and I found that everything but the ice cream bar I had in the freezer was frozen. But for the price, it's hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Good fridge
customer_reviews.text: There was a small dent on the side when it arrived. Since I desperately needed a fridge, I decided to keep it anyway. It's a nice fridge for a room. Only issue comes with the freezer compartment. When the temperature is cool enough for my food, it takes 2 days to make ice cubes. But afterall it's just a compartment in the fridge. I don't complain. To Amazon folks, Why should I evaluate its "warmth?"
customer_reviews.author: Yohan

customer_reviews.title: Loud, but works
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised, will freeze a drink if you set it too cold. However, it is noisy. when compressor is on, it sounds like rushing water, or a turning fan, but it will be the loudest sound in the room. I can hear it over the TV, or music playing, in the same room. Good price if noise is not an issue in your installation. If you're going to be anywhere close to it, or in a quiet room, I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: like2read

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this outdoors in the shade in a work environment in mid georgia and its working like a champ this year. For the price it could break this year and be worth the money for that ice cold water in 100+ temp
customer_reviews.author: Tukn22inch

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge
customer_reviews.text: Great little office fridge. No hassle; plugged it in and set the temp and haven't had to worry about it at all. If you listen closely you can sometimes just barely hear it running; but it is very quite. I thought it would be hard lugging it to my office, but it is remarkably light. Now, I'm not saying it will be a breeze to walk it a hundred yards, but it was easy to carry from my buildings loading/unloading zone.
customer_reviews.author: rgreen

customer_reviews.title: Great small refrigeration. Still works great.
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator works great. Super small size. The small size being great for my purposes. It has been working fine for 2 months in van. UPDATE: In very hot van all throughout summer this unit has been great. I am actually running it 24/7 by a modified sine wave inverter. It operates while driving, up and down hills, etc. I know it will likely reduce it's life by doing this, but it has saved me much trouble, and money on ice. Very pleased with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Professor Tjenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good size, drinks ice cold, lil freeze keeps candy frozen, no noise issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have it upstairs in my mancave. I find no major issues with noise. I have a futon right next to it that I have crashed out on and it didn't bother me at all. At the thermostat setting 1/2 way, it keeps my little diet sodas ice cold. I put a couple of candy bars in the freezer drawer for fun. Now about a month or so in and no issues, does the job. The door holds a 2 litre on one side and a buch of can sodas on the same door. Sandwiches and snakc stay nice and cold. I even keep packs of meats and cheeses and works perfect for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Owens

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fridge for water and drinks
customer_reviews.text: This is a compact and incredibly convenient mini-fridge. I keep mine in the corner of a bedroom and am able to keep quite a lot of bottled water, drinks and the occasional snack. I would not recommend keeping foods with a bit of odor in there as it will smell up the fridge. Temperature can be set form 1 (warmer) - 6 (coldest (even partially freezes some water bottles closer to the freezer section).
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect It says in the add the small freezer does not freeze thing my ice cream is fine I guess I bought a newer fridge because my roomate bought the same refrigerator a year ago and his freezer is not as good as mine would buy again hope I don"t have to
customer_reviews.author: ask

customer_reviews.title: COMPACT FRIDGE MISSING POWER CORD.
customer_reviews.text: COMPACT FRIDGE MISSING POWER CORD. MANUFACTURER WANTED ADDITIONAL MONEY, AMAZON ONLY HONORS REQUESTS FOR RETURNS AND REPLACEMENTS......DO NOT NEED A NEW FRIDGE (IF IT WORKS) ONLY THE POWER CORD. IN THE MEANTIME, FRIDGE IS TAKING UP SPACE, SO I WILL PROBABLY HAVE TO RETURN IT AND GET A NEW ONE ("FREE" BUT STILL A HASSLE TO REBOX THE ITEM AND LEAVE IT OUTSIDE, ETC., ETC., ETC. KEEP YOUR FINGERS CROSSED THAT THE SECOND FRIDGE, IF NECESSARY, IS NOT ALSO MISSING A POWER CORD.
customer_reviews.author: Hillary Nan Goldberg

customer_reviews.title: VERY SHORT LIFE SPAN!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this unit twice. The first one didn't work upon delivery so I swapped it out for a new one. The second unit worked for a few months before it stopped working too. Nothing works on the unit what so ever which is exactly what the first unit did. I can't recommend this product as it's a poorly constructed refrigerator due to a very short life span.
customer_reviews.author: nq

customer_reviews.title: Great fridge for a small office.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little fridge. I have a small office and was looking for a fridge that would fit a decent amount of items, while still being little enough to be discreet. It's great. Doesn't use a lot of energy and can hold several bottles of 16 oz water bottles, a few yogurts, and my lunch entree. The freezer is pretty small, but I rarely ever use it. When I do, it's big enough to fit one fairly large TV dinner. I don't like it sitting on the floor, so I bought a small table that sits about 10 inches off the floor. The fridge rests on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: That Math Chick

customer_reviews.title: Right size and it's quiet
customer_reviews.text: I have this fridge in my office at work. So far it's quiet (more so than anticipated) and has more than enough capacity for a few bottles of water, a quart of milk, and a dozen or more cans of soda. Can't really find a fault with it.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest E Hodge

customer_reviews.title: Bummer of a refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator stopped working after just 1 month. We bought an extended warranty, but are having a hard time getting through to customer service!
customer_reviews.author: MommaB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!! SUPER SUPER QUIET!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in a nursing home, and have this in my room for pop fruit etc. Absolutely love it---love---love it!! Noise is almost non existent!!! What noise??!! Which is most important to me! Love the warehouse deal I got on it--------in like new not used condition $65!! Just a couple of small areas where the plastic coating is off. Can easily be touched up!! No scratches or dents!! Haven't seen any any cheaper!! Love Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Paula J. Winans

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Uses about 70 watts when running at room temperature. Startup current about 7.5 amps, running current about 0.6 amps. At room temperature the duty cycle is 25% so average running wattage is 17.5 or 0.42 kw/day. I have measured this accurately because I'm running from solar panels.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Stouter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Boy this one is the perfect mini refrigerator to buy! It fits perfect in our family room where we watch our television, and I spend a lot of time crocheting, reading or sewing! It is the perfect size for water bottles, soda, yogurt, cottage cheese, and other snacks, and even ice cubes!
customer_reviews.author: Lillian R. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my office to hold drinks, lunch stuffs, condiments, and ice cubes. For just under two years, this fridge has served its purpose, well. I've defrosted it once, after getting used to the temperature setting (getting it just right). And, would recommend it to anyone looking for a small fridge for their office.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: NOT QUIET AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: All sorts of noises.. popping humming spraying and full array of noises.. Like my own personal noise machine.. I dont understand the reviewers that said this was silent.. This is not good for a quiet bedroom..
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Lasted for 3 years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Nov 28, 2014 and it died yesterday Nov 6, 2017. Not bad for $89.00. That's $29.67 per year not counting electricity costs to be able to have nice cold yogurt, juice, etc. at work every day. Well worth the money. Will likely buy another of the same type though it does seem from the reviews that there is a fairly high "lemon" risk. I only heard the noise in the beginning. Not sure if it got quieter or if I just got used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: PRODUCT UPDATE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've had my mini fridge for almost 2YEARS, and it's STILL running GREAT, it's STILL very COLD, and the little freezer is STILL keeping my ice cream sandwiches frozen. I can't believe this mini fridge gets ANY bad reviews, because it is STILL in perfect condition. I'm buying another one for my grandson, for his bedroom, to keep his little juices, and his waters. HE'S GOING TO LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Layton

customer_reviews.title: Great little fridge. Packaging easy to remove and set up (1 woman job ;) perfect temp @Med temp.
customer_reviews.text: Fridge was in perfect condition. Sufficient packing & secure, yet easy to unpack. All parts were taped inside and a BREEZE to remove. Plugged it in and that was it. No need for a video or pics, it's THAT easy. Started with temp at maximum= perfect. Changed to MED setting for 24 hrs now and the drinks are cold. So far, SO good!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Brown

customer_reviews.title: Oh Lort
customer_reviews.text: Based on her name and price, I really thought this midea fridge would be the one. I needed it for my office at work. Immediately when I plugged it in, it began to clang and pop. The noise was so loud, it carried down the office hallway to my coworkers. I gave it a day, thinking maybe she just needed to cool down, but the banging continued. Great return process on Amazon's part, but this fridge is a fail. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Walmart has it for $35 cheaper anyway
customer_reviews.text: This thing is very loud. I don’t mind any of it except the very high pitched ringing which hurts my ears. It does this almost constantly while in operation. Can’t use as I intended and have to keep it far away from where I’m at most of the time in order to get some use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Should have listened, refrigerator compressor goes in and out.
customer_reviews.text: Bought awhile back, after two other refrigerators of different brands, and this ones compressor goes in and out. I called customer support and they said as it is no longer under warranty I'll have to pay for any kind of help including answers to basic questions. Horrible customer service, and bad fridge. (The fridge never really got to temps to freeze stuff too well to begin with)
customer_reviews.author: Yoshimtu

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks nice and easy to maintain!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this because I noticed mixed reviews. I love it and haven’t had any issues. It looks nice, does what it’s supposed to do and is really convenient to have in my bedroom/office. I think it’s totally worth it. Hassle free 😊
customer_reviews.author: Laurelei

customer_reviews.title: 2 month old and door doesnt stay shut
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until a few days ago....the door wont stay closed. I have to use something to keep the door shut. I got this fridge 2 and a half month ago.
customer_reviews.author: vava

customer_reviews.title: Works well. No freezer compartment
customer_reviews.text: I don't get why people keep saying there's a small freezer. There isn't one. You can set the temp down to nearly a freezing, but it's all or nothing. That said, it works quite well and does the job without excess heat or noise.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Decent for office - as long as you don't mind gurgling
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent little fridge. It keeps items cold/frozen but it isn't the best thing to sit next to your desk at work. Whenever it cools, it has this fairly loud gurgling sound as it pushed the liquid through the pipes. It is just frequent enough to be quite annoying in a quiet office environment. We will see what I think after a few weeks of using it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Cold, quiet fridge
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good with this fridge. After hours of research, we settled on this fridge, and we've been really happy with it for the past couple of weeks. It's super quiet—we keep it near our bedroom but it doesn't disturb us at all with compressor noise, which we were worried about. Even when I'm right next to it, all I hear (sometimes) is a slight bubbling noise in the back. This fridge gets COLD, too. (In fact, our milk froze solid when I turned the knob to 75% of it's max cooling power, so keep that in mind!) It's also nice-looking—the chrome front is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: texasteacher

customer_reviews.title: Cools very well
customer_reviews.text: This little refrigerator works really well. It cools so well that I had to raise the setting because it was freezing some of my food. It runs very quietly. I didn't like the fact that the electric cord was stuck behind the compressor in the back and I had some trouble getting it out because I was afraid I might damage something.
customer_reviews.author: Mily

customer_reviews.title: Convenient as heck but a bit noisy
customer_reviews.text: Convenient size for use in a bedroom so insulin is handy at all times, and healthy drinks and snacks are available and in easy reach for those with limited mobility. Stays VERY cold, on medium setting is too cold for me. Biggest problem is the easily audible sound of swishing or running water that it emits the majority of the time. Freaked me out as it is right beside the area where I had plumbing repaired last year and I thought had plumbing issues again.
customer_reviews.author: Tee's

customer_reviews.title: So far very good.....
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two for our office at work. We've only had them for about a month, but so far they operate very well; the temperature is very good in the fridge and the freezer. I gave a 4 star rating because I'd like to give it more time. I'll update the rating in a few more months.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Three years and no issues.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quit fridge for the office. I liked it enough to purchase a second one three years later for the play room at home.
customer_reviews.author: S. Reigel

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Money; Learn from My Costly Mistake!
customer_reviews.text: I have had the refrigerator less than two and a half months. It stopped working. I am unable to return it, although the paperwork stated that it comes with a year warranty. Please learn from my costly mistake, and save your money! If I could give this refrigerator a rating of a zero, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great beauty fridge/ freezer!
customer_reviews.text: Great to use as a beauty fridge/ freezer. If you use ice rollers or ice packs and eye and face masks that need to be frozen this is a better idea than the tiny beauty fridges. It's a little large but well worth it #beautyfridge
customer_reviews.author: Marlu

customer_reviews.title: Keeps COLD!
customer_reviews.text: Fridge keeps cold, also, froze water for nice size ice cubes. Fridge is the perfect size. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Marg

customer_reviews.title: Dent and scratched door
customer_reviews.text: The bottom front door came with a dent and scratched. Not sure hiw it was packaged like this and sold.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: BUY ONE!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Compact Refrigerator. Only uses 70 watts. I run it on a 200 Watt Inverter powered by a 1000 watt Solar panel. For the size it holds plenty and is perfect for tight places. It will even Freeze all contents if cranked up. Very Quit while running. Very impressed with this great little box!
customer_reviews.author: Soundsailor

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini fridge for office or room
customer_reviews.text: Nice small mini fridge for an office or room. Mainly used in a room for liquids and keeps them cold and sometimes starts to freeze. Not as deep as I was expecting but if stacked correct has nice chance to store a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little fridge. It’s perfect for one person. It’s amazing how much food can be fit into it. There’s a little freezer as well. Every now and then it needs to be defrosted but that takes about an hour and there’s a pan that can collect the water or you can put your own pan in. I would buy one again if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie S.

customer_reviews.title: perfect for one or two
customer_reviews.text: I keep this under my desk at work. It fits all my food for each week. I keep muffins in the freezer and milk in the fridge. I have not had any issues with too much frost build up or temperature fluctuation. I did put a piece of Velcro across the door to prevent it from opening if bumped by the cleaners. It provides extra piece of mind.
customer_reviews.author: brenda n.

customer_reviews.title: Office fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for for an office fridge. It is pretty quiet. The only thing I have noticed after having it about 4 months is that the freezer is starting to build up with a little ice. That may be a pain when it builds up enough...
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This package was delivered with the entire bottom cut off and retaped. It was damp as if it was wet in transport. When I plugged it up it was fine then within 24 hours noises started. LOUD noises every hour like clockwork. Everything freezes no matter the temp you put it on. Even items in the door.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cold, quiet, sleek
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small office. Cold, quiet, and looks sleek.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like it and it can store all my yogurts and masks together! I don’t need to worried about my roommates will stolen my staffs
customer_reviews.author: lucy is lucky122

customer_reviews.title: No back grate/cover.
customer_reviews.text: Desktop-sized fridge. Suitable for drinks/cans but not much else. The entire back of the fridge is WIDE OPEN. The customary metal grate that covers the inner workings of a fridge? No such cover on this fridge. Going to try to jury-rig some chicken wire. Not pleased with it but too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Bex Caducea

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: The unit has only been in use for a month. We replaced it with my old dorm refrigerator (over 20 years). The refrigerator sides were so hot (you could not touch it with your hands) that we shut it down for fear of a fire. My old refrigerator cools, the sides remain cool, and we do not have the fear of a fire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the office!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this fridge to store my breastmilk while I was pumping at work. It fit perfectly underneath my desk and it was barely noticeable. It made the whole pumping process at work easier with having immediate access to a fridge. Used it for that purpose for over 1 year and then kept using it to store my lunch and snacks so I didn’t have to use the nasty breakroom fridge. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Aulona

customer_reviews.title: Good freezer until you turn it down a bit!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps things cold. Not cool. Friggin. COLD. I had to turn this down to about 1/4 power so that my soda wouldn't hurt my teeth. D: Very efficient, spacious on the inside compared to other fridges this size, and it makes a pleasant humming sound that lulls me to sleep at night.
customer_reviews.author: Tanara Petrova

customer_reviews.title: This fridge was great for a while but has started acting up (about ...
customer_reviews.text: This fridge was great for a while but has started acting up (about a year after use). So much ice has built up around the freezer inside that the freezer cover has popped off. Even after clearing the ice, it's back within a couple days and a lot of condensation builds up at the top of the fridge, near the freezer area. I will probably be replacing it since I've gotten to the point where I need to defrost the freezer every week or so.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Ok fridge
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok fridge. Good size for work, I use mine for lunch and storing breast milk when I pump at work. The little freezer is a good size for a small ice pack like what comes with a Medela pump cooler, however the door to the freezer is flimsy and doesn't seal well. My freezer is all frosted over in a thick layer after only owning a couple months. For the price I guess it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: kmontana

customer_reviews.title: The refrigerator is definitely cold enough. My only complaint ...
customer_reviews.text: The refrigerator is definitely cold enough. I keep mini bottles of water, wine and OJ and it is roomy enough for them all. My only complaint is that there is a constant water gurgling sound and this can be distracting when the room requires quiet. It is in my spa suite so I added a small waterfall and now they compliment each other so it is not as annoying as it once was.
customer_reviews.author: Mynx Madness

customer_reviews.title: great little frig gets really cold
customer_reviews.text: this frig is great. gets very cold. i have it set on number 4 out of 6 and its at about 40F. i use it in my garage for cold drinks. time will tell if it holds up but it looks to be well made !
customer_reviews.author: Rmac

customer_reviews.title: It would be a great little fridge if it didn't make so much noise ...
customer_reviews.text: It would be a great little fridge if it didn't make so much noise in the middle of the night! I am not normally disturbed by a little noise, but at 11 O'Clock at night it's making enough noise to wake up the devil, and that goes on for an hour or more! Would not suggest that you put it in your bedroom! Other than that, it works great and has enough space for anyone who doesn't need to store a lot in the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: moerschen

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little refrigerator for my office. It keeps everything nice and cold and is just the right size for my purpose. It is somewhat noisy, but all in all I am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tamber

customer_reviews.title: Compact size and ice cube compartment
customer_reviews.text: I bought a refurbished version of this model and could not be happier, it arrived in original package, very well protected and it is just as new. Also very compact but still a freezer compartment for ice. I use it at work, have it under neath my desk and keep foot and drinks cold all day long! Great little fridge.
customer_reviews.author: C. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Frig is very noisy. Bought for my office at work. It makes a lot more noise than other refrigerators I have had. If this is for a bedroom or sleeping area I think it’s too loud to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Nice mini fridge for the price
customer_reviews.text: Never had any problems, even on the highest setting it stays plenty cold. You do have to defrost the freezer compartment every few months, but I wouldnt recommend ever putting any frozen food in it as it doesnt stay cold enough in my opinion unless you crank the hold freezer up the max coldness which causes it to run to much(like this sentence)
customer_reviews.author: Lex Luger

customer_reviews.title: Just What the Doctor Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Packaged very securely and was as easy as pie to open. All I had to do was cut the four box straps and the whole cardboard box top slid off ... Not a dent or scratch anywhere. I chose this unit to fit under my garage workbench and it has exceeded all my expectations ... It keeps my beverages cold, blends right in to the surroundings and minds it's own business without any noise whatsoever. It's obvious to me that Amazon and this manufacturer have been paying attention to customer feedback, because they sure got it right this time.
customer_reviews.author: Gallinipper

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the size of it when it arrived, as it was much larger than I anticipated. Since I am living in a very cramped college dorm, I do wish it was a bit smaller in size so I could fit it under my bed. Other than that, it's pretty decent and gets the job done. Is also pretty quiet compared to a lot of other fridges. Freezer is decent as well but very limited space, the real test of this fridge will be AFTER the winter...
customer_reviews.author: gabbzster

customer_reviews.title: Keeps everything fresh and cold. No problems so far!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a family member in a nursing home so they can keep fresh fruit, veggie snacks, kombucha, etc. that is a hassle for staff members to keep track of that would otherwise be tossed. Plus, whatever they want chilled or needs refrigeration is right there whenever they want! They have had this item for 6 months already from a "no name" brand but have had zero issues. Purchased based on fellow Amazon reviews, hahaha. Can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great compact fridge. Perfect for my office. It's quiet, has a lot of room for all my snacks and lunch things, and it keeps everything just cold enough. I've had it for about 6 months now and I've only had to defrost it once (there was a very small amount of frosty business built up in the freezer part). I was hesitant to purchase because I didn't recognize the brand name, but this fridge is great!
customer_reviews.author: R.Hill

customer_reviews.title: HOT when first plugged in but great mini-Fridge!
customer_reviews.text: We were super scared when we first plugged this mini-fridge in because the sides got extremely HOT! I thought it was going to explode. We unplugged it, then plugged it in later, vowing to watch and ensure it didn't catch on fire. It must have had to burn off some protectant on the motor because it is working like a charm! It's actually a bit TOO COLD so we have been adjusting the temp after some grapes froze in fridge part. Makes whizzing noises now and then. Love the size, color.
customer_reviews.author: delia_m

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long :(
customer_reviews.text: Pretty bummed. Bought this for my husband for his classroom as a Christmas gift in 2016. That's only 3.5 years ago. It's only used about 9 months out of the year and defrosted and stored for the other 3. He went back to school last week and it's dead. Won't do a thing. A fridge should last longer than that. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little unit!
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! (Day 1) It took about half an hour to cool. It also isn't all that loud. I have it near my bed. The cats are taking time to get used to it but they aren't the ones giving the ratings! Upstanding bottles such as soda bottles have to be put on the side door. That's the only problem I have. Though it'd be easy enough to just take the shelf out I suppose which is why I am not lowering the stars in the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mistah Tim

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: Works okay for office. I do not like that food items freeze if too close to the small freezer portion. Would purchase one without freezer section next time. Quiet and gets slightly warm on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: T Angel

customer_reviews.title: Clean lines, quiet, nice and cold!
customer_reviews.text: Clean design, separate freezer section (not for freezing, will just keep frozen goods frozen) very quiet operating, reversible door. The unit came nicely boxed. Plugged it in and came up to temperature within two hours. Good tight door seal. Nice fit and finish. It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: ArtStream

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice mini fridge
customer_reviews.text: Biggest advice I can give you is don't set it to the maximum setting. Things below the small freezer will freeze and liquids will be brain freeze cold. I even experienced an instant freeze of a water bottle for the first time so that was cool. I can see how it might be a little on the noisy side if you're trying to cuddle with it in bed so maybe leave it on the other side of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Ganzley

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mini frig for about a year. I keep it in a corner of my upstairs master bedroom stocked with water... it’s work very well ... keeps my water super cool...love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Jones-Berry

customer_reviews.title: Loud!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works pretty good but it's extremely loud. I have it in my office at work and sometimes it get annoying its so loud. It's pretty cheap so I would recommend putting it in a shop but not in an office.
customer_reviews.author: AirplaneBlaine

customer_reviews.title: Gets Super Cold!!
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my theater room. Perfect size and can hold a bottle of champagne or wine so that’s a bonus! Also keeps beverages SUPER cold! I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nat Nat

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, cute, & useful
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, cute, and useful. Fits perfectly in my office! I put my keurig on top of it. Temperature adjustment is extremely easy and can keeps things very cold. I had to turn the dial down a bit cause it was nearly 32°F at the midway point.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

product_meta.title: Midea WHS-65LB1 Compact Single Reversible Door Refrigerator, 1.6 Cubic Feet(0.045 Cubic Meter), Black
product_meta.description:
Size:1.6 Cubic Feet| Color:Blackmidea WHS-65LB1 Compact Single Reversible Door Refrigerator and Freezer, 1. 6 Cubic Feet, Black.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Midea is proud to offer a fine selection of the highest quality refrigerators and freezers in a variety of styles and functions. This model features… Net capacity: 1.6 cu.ft. Environment-friendly technology. Professional and energy saving. Reversible door-left or right swing. Convenient racks on door. Separate chiller compartment. Unit Dimension: (W*D*H): 17.72*18.58*19.37 inch. Loading Capacity(40HQ): 496pcs. Midea is a global company on a mission to provide outstanding quality and value above all else. At the core of their business is the basic, but ever-important concepts of quality and value; concepts that many companies have forgotten or neglected in recent decades. In their climb through the refrigeration and air conditioning markets, their pursuit of market leadership is driven by the desire to be a customer-focused, global company that delivers exceptional quality, innovation and value in all aspects of their operations -- from product development and production, to delivery and customer support. The company's core products are residential air conditioning, commercial air conditioning, washing machines, and refrigeration.Electrical Requirements :60Hz
feature_bullets: Mechanical temperature adjustment ranges from -2' to 2' Celsius (32' to 35.6'fahrenheit)
Large storage areas excellent at chilling beverages and healthy snacks/produce, however cannot be used for storing frozen foods or making ice cubes
Features Adjustable Legs and a Reversible Door that can Open from Left or Right. Min/Max Frozen Food Section-32~50
External Product Dimensions: 17.7 x 18.6 x 19.4" Note: The internal walls of the main compartment are slightly tapered toward the back

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,234 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
